name: Your Ancestors Are Watching
description:
Play to lose game of feudal mechs, for 1-5 players. 

You and the other players are Khals who inherited your powerful house and its great ancestral mech, honor, land, and serfs. Your responsibility? To continue the lineage.
But that’s not what happened.

You’re now in the same dank tavern, drinking away your sorrows. In this game you will collaboratively tell the story of how you inherited greatness... and then lost it all.
